trans-unit.source: Represents a key identifier clause that is based on XML.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma cláusula do identificador da chave que é baseada em XML.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class by using the specified XML element.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref> classe utilizando o elemento XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType%2A> property is initialized to `null` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength%2A> property is initialized to zero in the new instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType%2A>propriedade é inicializada para `null` e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength%2A>propriedade é inicializada para zero na nova instância.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML element that represents the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: O elemento XML que representa a cláusula do identificador da chave.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml*>

trans-unit.source: referenceXML is .
trans-unit.target: referenceXMLis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class by using the specified XML element, nonce, and derivation length.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref> classe utilizando o comprimento do elemento, nonce e derivação XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType%2A> property is initialized to `null` in the new instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType%2A>propriedade é inicializada para `null` na nova instância.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML element that represents the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: O elemento XML que representa a cláusula do identificador da chave.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml*>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the nonce that was used to create a derived key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém o nonce que foi utilizado para criar uma chave derivada.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Sets the value that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce*> method.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor que é devolvido pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce*>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce*>

trans-unit.source: The size of the derived key.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da chave derivada.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength*>

trans-unit.source: referenceXML is .
trans-unit.target: referenceXMLis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether specified key identifier clause matches the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se a cláusula do identificador de chave especificado corresponde a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: For the match to succeed, the specified key identifier clause must be assignable from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause> and its markup (XML) must match that of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Para a correspondência com êxito, a cláusula do identificador de chave especificado tem de ser atribuível a partir do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause>e respetivos markup (XML) tem de corresponder desta instância.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause>

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OuterXml%2A> property of the element specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml%2A> property is compared for the two instances.)
trans-unit.target: (O <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OuterXml%2A>propriedade do elemento especificado pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml%2A>propriedade é comparada para as duas instâncias.)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OuterXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause to which to compare current instance.
trans-unit.target: A cláusula do identificador da chave para o qual comparar a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key identifier clause matches the current instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a cláusula do identificador de chave especificado corresponde a instância atual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML element that represents the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento XML que representa a cláusula do identificador da chave.

trans-unit.source: The XML element that represents the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: O elemento XML que representa a cláusula do identificador da chave.
